title: Ideas to make this Sub-Reddit Active?
content: Drop in your ideas and let's see if we can increase activity here!!

comments.body: I am guessing we publicise this sub through other mediums. Because we have a lot of nerds weebs noobs gamers memers in our college that could use one another.
make instagram meme page admins post memes here along with instagram
i have reached out to few, maybe you guys can also ask around

We are back

With another name
